list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update version to 1.9 in project file
Updated AssemblyVersion and FileVersion from 1.8 to 1.9 in the FindRomCover.csproj file. This prepares the project for the next release or deployment iteration. No other changes were introduced.

task.summary:
Simplify workspace.xml and update configurations
Removed unnecessary components and old task records to streamline workspace.xml. Also updated various configuration settings for better project maintenance and clarity.
Default task

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment:
Simplify workspace.xml and update configurations
Removed unnecessary components and old task records to streamline workspace.xml. Also updated various configuration settings for better project maintenance and clarity.

task.summary:
Improve workspace configurations and enhance MainWindow behavior
Streamlined the workspace.xml by removing unnecessary components and updating various configuration settings for better project maintenance and clarity. Additionally, modified MainWindow.xaml.cs to clear SimilarImages when an item is removed.

Update workspace configurations and MainWindow behavior
Streamlined workspace.xml by removing unnecessary components and updating configurations for better project maintenance. Additionally, modified MainWindow.xaml.cs to clear SimilarImages when an item is removed. Added .idea/ to .gitignore.

Update workspace configurations and MainWindow behavior
Streamlined workspace.xml by removing unnecessary components and updating configurations for better project maintenance. Additionally, modified MainWindow.xaml.cs to clear SimilarImages when an item is removed. Added .idea/ to .gitignore.

Add image similarity feature and context menu commands
Implemented image similarity calculations and added a dynamic context menu with commands for image handling. Updated settings, introduced new classes for command and UI functionality, and refined MainWindow behavior for better user interaction.

Add image similarity feature and context menu commands
Implemented image similarity calculations and added a dynamic context menu with commands for image handling. Updated settings, introduced new classes for command and UI functionality, and refined MainWindow behavior for better user interaction.

Add new images to resources and update UI references
Updated the project to include 'usethis.png' and 'folder.png' images, reflecting these changes in the resource definitions. Adjusted UI references in MainWindow.xaml and ButtonFactory.cs to use the new images. Additionally, enhanced MainWindow.xaml with more thumbnail size options.

Update images and UI references in project
Included 'usethis.png' and 'folder.png' images in the resource definitions and updated UI references in MainWindow.xaml and ButtonFactory.cs to reflect these changes. Additionally, enhanced MainWindow.xaml with more thumbnail size options.

Update workspace and image configurations
Revised workspace.xml to improve project maintenance and updated task duration for accuracy. Adjusted image references and enhanced UI in MainWindow.xaml for more functionality. ```

Remove obsolete screenshots and update configurations
Deleted unused screenshots from the repository to declutter files and improve management. Revised workspace.xml to enhance project maintenance and updated the README to reflect these changes. Adjusted image references to ensure the UI functions optimally with the current set of assets.

Refine README.md for clarity and consistency
Improved the explanation of the application's functionality and adjusted minor wording for consistency. Updated the donation link and corrected typographical errors. These changes aim to enhance the clarity and ease of understanding for readers.

Sort files alphabetically in MainWindow file search
The file retrieval process in MainWindow.xaml.cs has been updated to sort files alphabetically, enhancing consistency and predictability in file handling. Additionally, the workspace.xml comments and tasks have been updated to refine project documentation and task descriptions, focusing on clarity and consistency of the README.

Update version to 1.7.0 in project configuration
The AssemblyVersion and FileVersion in FindRomCover.csproj have been updated to 1.7.0, reflecting a new version release. This change ensures proper version tracking and aligns with the latest project updates.

Simplify error messages and update version to 1.7.0.
Refined error message text in MainWindow.xaml.cs for clarity. Updated workspace configurations to reflect version 1.7.0, ensuring proper version tracking and alignment with project changes. Adjusted ButtonFactory formatting for improved readability.

Simplify error messages and update version to 1.7.0.
Refined error messages in MainWindow.xaml.cs for better clarity. Updated workspace configurations to align with version 1.7.0 for accurate tracking. Adjusted ButtonFactory formatting to improve readability and maintainability.

Simplify error handling and improve project configurations.
Refined error handling in MainWindow.xaml.cs by adding exception type details and improving message clarity. Updated workspace configurations to align with version 1.7.0, enabling accurate version tracking. Enhanced code readability and maintainability with updated formatting.

Simplify error handling and improve project configurations.
Refined error handling in MainWindow.xaml.cs by adding exception type details and improving message clarity. Updated workspace configurations to align with version 1.7.0, enabling accurate version tracking. Enhanced code readability and maintainability with updated formatting.

Update target framework to .NET 9 and bump version to 1.8.
Upgraded project to target .NET 9.0, ensuring compatibility with newer features. Updated assembly and file versions to 1.8, added LangVersion 13, and adjusted project configurations for improved clarity and maintainability.

Expand supported file extensions in settings.xml
Added multiple new file extensions to the SupportedExtensions list in settings.xml to improve compatibility with various file types. This change enhances the tool's versatility and ensures broader support for diverse formats.

Update version to 1.9 in project file
Updated AssemblyVersion and FileVersion from 1.8 to 1.9 in the FindRomCover.csproj file. This prepares the project for the next release or deployment iteration. No other changes were introduced.

MESSAGE.value:
Simplify workspace.xml and update configurations
Removed unnecessary components and old task records to streamline workspace.xml. Also updated various configuration settings for better project maintenance and clarity.

Improve workspace configurations and enhance MainWindow behavior
Streamlined the workspace.xml by removing unnecessary components and updating various configuration settings for better project maintenance and clarity. Additionally, modified MainWindow.xaml.cs to clear SimilarImages when an item is removed.

Update workspace configurations and MainWindow behavior
Streamlined workspace.xml by removing unnecessary components and updating configurations for better project maintenance. Additionally, modified MainWindow.xaml.cs to clear SimilarImages when an item is removed. Added .idea/ to .gitignore.

Increase similarity threshold to 80 and add new features
Updated the similarity threshold from 70 to 80 in settings.xml to improve image matching accuracy. Added new classes ImageData, DelegateCommand, and ButtonFactory to enhance functionality. Enhanced MainWindow behavior and improved the SimilarityCalculator for better error handling and performance.

Add image similarity feature and context menu commands
Implemented image similarity calculations and added a dynamic context menu with commands for image handling. Updated settings, introduced new classes for command and UI functionality, and refined MainWindow behavior for better user interaction.

Add new images to resources and update UI references
Updated the project to include 'usethis.png' and 'folder.png' images, reflecting these changes in the resource definitions. Adjusted UI references in MainWindow.xaml and ButtonFactory.cs to use the new images. Additionally, enhanced MainWindow.xaml with more thumbnail size options.

Update images and UI references in project
Included 'usethis.png' and 'folder.png' images in the resource definitions and updated UI references in MainWindow.xaml and ButtonFactory.cs to reflect these changes. Additionally, enhanced MainWindow.xaml with more thumbnail size options.

Update workspace and image configurations
Revised workspace.xml to improve project maintenance and updated task duration for accuracy. Adjusted image references and enhanced UI in MainWindow.xaml for more functionality. ```

Remove obsolete screenshots and update configurations
Deleted unused screenshots from the repository to declutter files and improve management. Revised workspace.xml to enhance project maintenance and updated the README to reflect these changes. Adjusted image references to ensure the UI functions optimally with the current set of assets.

Refine README.md for clarity and consistency
Improved the explanation of the application's functionality and adjusted minor wording for consistency. Updated the donation link and corrected typographical errors. These changes aim to enhance the clarity and ease of understanding for readers.

Sort files alphabetically in MainWindow file search
The file retrieval process in MainWindow.xaml.cs has been updated to sort files alphabetically, enhancing consistency and predictability in file handling. Additionally, the workspace.xml comments and tasks have been updated to refine project documentation and task descriptions, focusing on clarity and consistency of the README.

Update version to 1.7.0 in project configuration
The AssemblyVersion and FileVersion in FindRomCover.csproj have been updated to 1.7.0, reflecting a new version release. This change ensures proper version tracking and aligns with the latest project updates.

Simplify error messages and update version to 1.7.0.
Refined error message text in MainWindow.xaml.cs for clarity. Updated workspace configurations to reflect version 1.7.0, ensuring proper version tracking and alignment with project changes. Adjusted ButtonFactory formatting for improved readability.

Upgraded project to target .NET 9.0, ensuring compatibility with newer features. Updated assembly and file versions to 1.8, added LangVersion 13, and adjusted project configurations for improved clarity and maintainability.

Added multiple new file extensions to the SupportedExtensions list in settings.xml to improve compatibility with various file types. This change enhances the tool's versatility and ensures broader support for diverse formats.
